item.title: Build Sequel Pro from source in XCode 10
item.description: Sequel Pro is great GUI MySQL tool in macOS (it’s open source and of course totally free) !

item.title: #TIL : The safest way to reset root password of MySQL Server
item.description: The safest way to reset root password of MySQL Server When you get stucked in this error message “Access denied for user ‘root@localhost’ …”, you search the way to reset the root password on the Internet, but life is Hard !

item.title: #TIL : Sleeping connections in MySQL
item.description: Sleeping connections in MySQL When you check your MySQL process list via command show processlist;, it will show you a useful table which provide all current connection details.

item.title: #TIL : Mycli : a new good cli MySql Client
item.description: Mycli : a new good cli MySql Client This tool is written in Python with super cool features (auto-complete and colors).

item.title: #TIL : Mysql dumping only table structure
item.description: Mysql dumping only table structure Adding -D to dump only data structure Example : $ mysqldump -h 127.

item.title: #TIL : Persistent connection to MySQL
item.description: Persistent connection to MySQL When a PHP process connects to MySQL server, the connection can be persistent if your PHP config has mysql.

item.title: #TIL : UNION vs UNION ALL
item.description: UNION vs UNION ALL The difference is UNION command will sort and remove duplicated rows (RETURNED ONLY DISTINCT ROWS)

item.title: #TIL : String problems can cause logical bugs in application
item.description: String problems can cause logical bugs in application Example table mysql> describe `test`; +------------+-------------+------+-----+-------------------+----------------+ | Field | Type | Null | Key | Default | Extra | +------------+-------------+------+-----+-------------------+----------------+ | id | smallint(6) | NO | PRI | NULL | auto_increment | | name | varchar(50) | NO | | NULL | | | created_at | timestamp | YES | MUL | CURRENT_TIMESTAMP | | +------------+-------------+------+-----+-------------------+----------------+ 3 rows in set (0.

item.title: #TIL : Index is useless when use function on indexed field
item.description: Index is useless when use function on indexed field Reality, if using function on indexed field, you will broke indexing by accident.
